cause.description:
English should be deemed the National Language of the United States. It is a symbol of our country and is losing it's importance daily as minority languages continue to gain ground. We must maintain the importance of not only our native tongue but also our heritage. Otherwise, the hundreds of similar groups will make no impact on our politicians.
1. English must be made the National Language of America
2. English classes should be made optional
cause.name: Make Englilsh the National Language of the USA
